Package DynaBlast

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • DynaBlast.Creatures
      • DynaBlast.Character
  • public class Character
extends Creatures
    Class representing player's character class extends class @Creatures 4 different skins for character each has size of standard @Tile contains information about lives and score of the player

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static double dirX
      amount of distance to move horizontal

      image of character

      static boolean isMovingY
      contains info about vertical move
      static double movementSpeed
      basic movement speed may be edited by factor from config

      • Fields inherited from class DynaBlast.Creatures

        height, width, x, y

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Character​(char type, int lives)
      creates object of character with skin chosen by player character always start at left top corner of the map (@Level.margin + @Tile.tileSize)

      • Character

        public Character​(char type,
                 int lives)
        creates object of character with skin chosen by player character always start at left top corner of the map (@Level.margin + @Tile.tileSize)
        Parameters:
        type - information which skin of character player has chosen
        lives - information about remaining lives of the player
